AboutUs.title: AboutUs
AboutUs.PageContent: In the previous program we create an XML file and named it as products.xml. The following C# program read that file and extract the contents inside the XML tag.

ContactUs.title: ContactUs
ContactUs.PageContent: XML is a platform independent language, so the information formatted in XML can be used in any other platforms (Operating Systems) ... sender, EventArgs e) { XmlTextWriter writer = new XmlTextWriter("product.xml", System. ... filter in a XML file · How to insert data from XML to database · How to create Excel file from XML ...
